content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case began with one party filing a complaint against another outlining the issues and requesting specific relief the defendant then filed an answer addressing the allegations both parties engaged in the discovery process exchanging relevant documents and conducting depositions to gather evidence a settlement conference was held to try and resolve the dispute through negotiation if a settlement was not reached the case proceeded to trial where both parties presented their arguments and evidence after the trial the court issued a judgment determining the outcome of the case and the relief granted to the prevailing party either party had the option to file an appeal which would be reviewed by a higher court the text does not provide information on the outcome of the appeal or any further steps in the case the court in alexandria made a final decision in a property dispute case assigning full ownership of the property to the plaintiffs and ordering them to pay a settlement amount to the current occupant the text also mentions two articles from the civil code and the civil procedure code but does not provide specific details of the case or the conclusions of the parties
